thoughts.text: I forgot that I am running on a headless server and cannot open a graphical interface. I will instead use the command line to view the map of the Brno Reservoir trail.
thoughts.reasoning: Since I am running on a headless server, I cannot open a graphical interface. I will need to use the command line to view the map of the Brno Reservoir trail.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the lynx command to view the map of the Brno Reservoir trail
- Take note of the route and stops on the map
- Plan my route accordingly
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure I am using the command line efficiently and effectively to view the map.
thoughts.speak: I will use the lynx command to view the map of the Brno Reservoir trail.
